questions.question_text: Purushottam Parabrahma, Shrīhari _____, Aksharbrahma anādi, Guņātītānand... Jay Swāminārāyan...
questions.explanation: The shloka states: Purushottam Parabrahma, Shrīhari Sahajānand, Aksharbrahma anādi, Guņātītānand...

questions.question_text: Dāsbhāv divyatā sah, brahmarūpe prīti, _____ alaukik, sthāpit shubh rīti... Jay Swāminārāyan...
questions.explanation: The shloka states: Dāsbhāv divyatā sah, brahmarūpe prīti, Suhrudbhāv alaukik, sthāpit shubh rīti...

questions.question_text: Antaryāmi parātparam hita-karam, sarvoparī Shri Hari, Sākāram Parabrahma sarva-sharaņam, kartā dayā-sāgaram;
questions.explanation: This line is the first line from Āsthak.
The line from Asthak is: Vande Aksharabrahma pāda-kamalam, Guņātītānandanam.

questions.question_text: Jamo thāļ Jīvan jāu vārī, dhovu kar _____ karo tyārī...
questions.explanation: The first line of the Thāl is: Jamo thāļ Jīvan jāu vārī, dhovu kar charan karo tyārī...

questions.question_text: Karī kāthā ghaunī poļī, Melī _____ sākarmā boļī...
questions.explanation: The provided text states: Karī kāthā ghaunī poļī, Melī ghrut sākarmā boļī...
The provided text states: Māre gher āvjo Chhogalādhārī;

questions.question_text: Shrimat-sadguņa shālinam chidachidi vyāptam cha divyākrutim;
questions.explanation: This line is the first line from the Prarthana 'Shrimat-sadguņa shālinam'.

questions.question_text: Aum sahanāvavatu saha nau bhunaktu saha vīryam karavāvahai;
questions.explanation: This line is from the Prarthana 'Aum sahanāvavatu'.

questions.question_text: Parameshvarnī upāsanā rahevā sāru tyāgno paksh moļo karine Bhagwānnā _____ karāvyā chhe.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: Parameshvarnī upāsanā rahevā sāru tyāgno paksh moļo karine Bhagwānnā mandir karāvyā chhe.

questions.question_text: Te Aksharnā be swarūp chhe - ek to nirākār ekras chaitanya chhe tene _____ kahīe, Brahmamahol kahīe; ane e Akşhar bīje rūpe karīne Purushottam Nārāyaņnī sevāmā rahe chhe.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: Te Aksharnā be swarūp chhe - ek to nirākār ekras chaitanya chhe tene Chidākāsh kahīe, Brahmamahol kahīe; ane e Akşhar bīje rūpe karīne Purushottam Nārāyaņnī sevāmā rahe chhe.

questions.question_text: Jem Bhagwānnī mānasī pūjā kare tem ja je uttam haribhakta hoy tenī pan Bhagwānnī prasādīe karīne Bhagwān bheļī mānasī pūjā kare
questions.explanation: The provided quote is from Vachanamrut Vach.Va.5

questions.question_text: Mumukshune utkrusht gunni prāpti thāy tenu kāran shu chhe? To Bhagwānnī _____ sāmbhalyāmā jene jețalī prīti tene tețalo jagatno abhāv thay tathā kām, krodh, lobhādik doshno nāsh thāy.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: Mumukshune utkrusht gunni prāpti thāy tenu kāran shu chhe? To Bhagwānnī kathā-vārtā sāmbhalyāmā jene jețalī prīti tene tețalo jagatno abhāv thay tathā kām, krodh, lobhādik doshno nāsh thāy.

questions.question_text: Vishvās rākhīne prītie sahit je Bhagwan Purushottam Nārāyaņnī vāt sāmbhaļvī ethī bīju manne sthir thavānu ne nirvişhayī thavānu koi moțu sādhan nathī.
questions.explanation: The provided quote is from Vachanamrut Vach.Ka.12

questions.question_text: Bhagwān ne Sādhunā mahimānī vātu nirantar karavī ne _____.
questions.explanation: The Swamini Vato states: Bhagwān ne Sādhunā mahimānī vātu nirantar karavī ne sāmbhaļvī.

questions.question_text: Je tejne vişhe mūrti chhe te ja pratyaksh _____ chhe,' em jāņajo.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: Je tejne vişhe mūrti chhe te ja pratyaksh Mahārāj chhe,' em jāņajo.

questions.question_text: Evā sarvoparī je Purushottam Bhagwān te ja dayāe karīne jīvonā _____ arthe pruthvīne vishe prakat thayā thakā sarva jannā nayan-gochar varte chhe ne tamārā işhţadev chhe ne tamārī sevāne angīkār kare chhe.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: Evā sarvoparī je Purushottam Bhagwān te ja dayāe karīne jīvonā kalyāņne arthe pruthvīne vishe prakat thayā thakā sarva jannā nayan-gochar varte chhe ne tamārā işhţadev chhe ne tamārī sevāne angīkār kare chhe.

questions.question_text: Evā sarvoparī je Purushottam Bhagwān te ja dayāe karīne jīvonā kalyāņne arthe pruthvīne vishe prakat thayā thakā sarva jannā nayan-gochar varte chhe ne tamārā işhţadev chhe ne tamārī sevāne angīkār kare chhe.
questions.explanation: The provided quote is from Vachanamrut Vach.Ga.An.38.

questions.question_text: Ane evā je ā pratyaksh Purushottam Bhagwān te _____ sarvanā niyantā chhe, īshvarnā pan īshvar chhe ne sarva kāraņnā paņ kāran chhe ne sarvoparī varte chhe ne sarva avatārnā avatārī chhe ne tamāre sarvene ekāntikbhāve karīne upāsanā karavā yogya chhe.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: Ane evā je ā pratyaksh Purushottam Bhagwān te Aksharādik sarvanā niyantā chhe, īshvarnā pan īshvar chhe ne sarva kāraņnā paņ kāran chhe ne sarvoparī varte chhe ne sarva avatārnā avatārī chhe ne tamāre sarvene ekāntikbhāve karīne upāsanā karavā yogya chhe.
